Stock #: J80557 VIN: WDDUG8GB0JA374869 4MATIC(R), Black Leather, 13 Speakers, 19" Multi-Spoke Wheels, 4-Wheel Disc Brakes, ABS brakes, Adaptive suspension, Air Conditioning, AM/FM radio: SiriusXM, memory, Heated door mirrors, Heated Front Seats, Heated front seats, HVAC memory, Illuminated entry, Knee airbag, Low tire pressure warning, Memory seat, Nappa Leather Upholstery, Navigation system: COMAND, Occupant sensing airbag, Outside temperature display, Overhead airbag, Overhead console, Panic alarm, Passenger door bin, Passenger vanity mirror, Power adjustable front head restraints, Power adjustable rear head restraints, Power door mirrors, Power driver seat, Power moonroof, Power passenger seat, Power steering, Power windows, Premium audio system: COMAND, Pre-Wiring for CD Player, controls, Tachometer, Telescoping steering wheel, Tilt steering wheel, Traction control, Trip computer, Turn signal indicator mirrors, Variably intermittent wipers, and Weather band radio. 17/27mpg Iridium Silver 4D Sedan 4.0L V8 9-Speed Automatic 27/17 Highway/City MPG 4MATIC(R) 4MATIC(R), Black Leather. *Your additional costs are sales tax, tag and title fees for the state in which the vehicle will be registered, $925 freight (all new Mercedes-Benz models); $995 freight (all new Sprinter models), any dealer-installed options (if applicable) and a $299 dealer processing fee. Pricing and incentives may vary if vehicle is leased. Prices are subject to change, and prior sales are excluded from these offers. If you live in Silver Spring, Arlington or Rockville, you are just a short trip away from a new or used Mercedes-Benz car, truck, or SUV. Call or visit us today for great offers!
